ygData.subject: Faerie blocking
ygData.msgSnippet: Guess what, DPH... faeries can t fly over walls! So use them to block. And the walls with battlements, the slots at the top, allow things to be fired through

Guess what, DPH... faeries can't fly over walls! So use them to block. And 
the walls with battlements, the slots at the top, allow things to be fired 
through them. The one problem with that is that Scen.exe only gives you the 
crenellated walls which run horizontally across the screen. The vertical 
ones do exist (I've used 'em a lot), but you have to grab them off of a 
pre-existing level and then load your level. I think you can find them at 
the far left of Jakarta's Woods... For stuff like this, I used Editor.exe to 
make a palette map which contains every tile. Each tile has a corresponding 
number in Editor, so you just click on 1, set down a tile, click 2, set down 
a tile, etc. The problem is that if you go too far, the map won't load, and 
I forget exactly how many tile types there are. You can find out for 
yourself, of course, using trial and error. Definitely more than a hundred.  
          -T.
